about_the_game:
Welcome to Nightmare crew, a thrilling cooperative horror adventure where you and up to three friends become a film crew on a mission to prove the existence of a terrifying monster. But beware, getting the evidence you need is the hard part — escaping with it is even harder!

You and your team have been hired to document the truth behind local legends., you'll explore dark, eerie environments where the line between myth and reality blurs. Every sound, shadow, and strange occurrence could be a clue—or a sign that the monster is closer than you think.

Key Features:


  • Collaborative Gameplay: Work together with up to three friends, each taking on unique roles within the film crew. Teamwork is essential as you gather evidence and avoid becoming the next victims of the monster.

  • Dynamic Horror: The monster adapts to your tactics, making every playthrough a unique experience. No two encounters are the same, and you'll never know what lurks around the next corner.

  • Tense Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a richly detailed world filled with chilling ambiance, from abandoned buildings to dense forests. The haunting soundtrack and sound design will keep you on edge from start to finish.

  • Collect and Escape: Gather enough evidence to prove the monster's existence, but be careful—getting too close might mean you won’t live to share your findings. Can you escape with the truth, or will you become just another missing person?

  • Replayability: Multiple locations, randomized clues, and various monster types ensure that no two investigations are alike. Will you find the proof you need, or will you succumb to fear?

Grab your gear, rally your team, and dive into Nightmare Crew The truth is out there—if you live long enough to reveal it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 / Radeon RX 5700
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: You are a film crew tasked with proving the existence of a monster. Collaborate with up to three friends and escape with enough evidence (that's the hard part) to prove it!
